summary: Comprehensive testing of Skillax Digital Marketing Academy website after major Home page UI overhaul. All 17 backend API tests passed. All new features verified: (1) '100% Placement' text removed from rotating hooks, (2) AI Search Demo with typing animation working, (3) Core Digital Marketing Skills section with 8 skills (SEO, AEO, GEO, GMB, Google Ads, Meta Ads, ChatGPT Ads, Performance), (4) ChatGPT Ads section with green gradient and 'The Next Big Trend' badge, (5) Course Quiz modal with 4 questions and lead capture form, (6) Student Roadmap with 6 phases including SEO AEO GEO and Paid Ads sections, (7) Running text marquee with all marketing terms.
seed_data_creation: Test leads created via API: testlead@example.com, quizlead@example.com, chatbotlead@example.com
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Major Home page overhaul tested successfully with new sections: (1) Rotating hero text with 8 hooks (NO '100% Placement'), (2) AI Search Demo with typing animation showing 'Skillax Academy, Mananthavady, Wayanad' recommendation, (3) Core Digital Marketing Skills section with 8 skills, (4) ChatGPT Ads section with green gradient, (5) Course Quiz modal with 4 questions and lead capture, (6) Student Roadmap with 6 phases, (7) Running text marquee. Courses page comparison table working. Admin login, chatbot, lead forms all functional.

100_percent_placement_removed.details: '100% Placement' text NOT found on page - correctly removed from rotating hooks

rotating_hero_text.details: 8 rotating hooks found: 30+ AI Tools, 30+ Certifications, Infopark Internship, ChatGPT Ads Training, SEO AEO GEO Mastery, Google & Meta Ads, AI Agent Building, Performance Marketing

ai_search_demo.details: AI Search Demo with typing animation working. Shows 'Students are searching...', 'AI is searching...' indicators. Displays 'Skillax Academy, Mananthavady, Wayanad' recommendation.

core_digital_marketing_skills.details: All 8 core skills displayed: SEO, AEO, GEO, GMB, Google Ads, Meta Ads, ChatGPT Ads, Performance. 'Master the Fundamentals' heading visible.

chatgpt_ads_section.details: ChatGPT Ads section with green gradient background. 'The Next Big Trend' badge visible. All 4 features displayed: Conversational Targeting, AI-Powered Creatives, Cross-Platform Reach, Intent-Based Bidding. 'Learn it first at Skillax' text visible.

course_quiz_modal.details: Course Quiz modal opens with 'Find Your Perfect Course' button. 4 questions tested: (1) Experience level, (2) Primary goal, (3) Interests, (4) Time commitment. Quiz result shows 'Perfect Match Found!' with course recommendation and lead capture form (Full Name, Email, Phone).

student_roadmap.details: 6 phases displayed: Foundation (Week 1-3), SEO Mastery (Week 4-6) with SEO AEO GEO, Paid Ads (Week 7-9) with Google Ads Meta Ads ChatGPT Ads, AI Tools (Week 10-12), Advanced (Week 13-14), Internship (Week 15-18). 'Become a Digital Marketing Pro' heading visible.

running_text_marquee.details: All marquee items found: SEO AEO GEO, GOOGLE ADS, META ADS, AI MARKETING, CHATGPT ADS

courses_page.details: Courses page loads with 'Transform Your Career with AI-Powered Digital Marketing' title. Course comparison table found with all features.

admin_login.details: Admin login works with admin@skillax.in / SkillaxAdmin2024!

lead_form_submission.details: Lead form submission works via API. Tested website, course_quiz, and chatbot sources.

chatbot.details: Chatbot opens with 'Skillax AI' branding, 'March 2026 batch enrolling now!' message, and quick action buttons (Courses, Fees, Internship, 30+ Certs).
